about:
So I pride myself in my archery and bow spamming (I like fighting people with a bow when they are only three blocks away) and I would say I am pretty good at Nebula and okay at Nexus. I have quite an arsenal of strats that I have developed over the years, most of which work quite efficiently. So yeah, this is getting quite long, so I will wrap it up. Last thing, just a shout-out to the mods and admins, COULD YOU PLEASE BRING BACK DEH SMOKE BOW?!?!? I loved that thing and it was by far my favorite point-redeemer. Okay so I guess that is it!

P.S. If you were wondering about my name, I created it about 3 years ago and it is basically ten year old talk for mischief lover (i thought the way I wrote it was kuel back den). 
PS: I am part of the Eternal Class
